properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND "POINT_DATE" BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) AND TO_DATE(?)
